verses.verse: And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> on you, the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall call <S%H7725><s%> them to mind <S%H3824><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has driven <S%H5080><s%> you,

And shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and shall obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> you and your children, <S%H1121><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul; <S%H5315><s%>

That then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> your captivity, <S%H7622><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on you, and will return <S%H7725><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has scattered <S%H6327><s%> you.

If <S%H518><s%> any of your be driven <S%H5080><s%> out to the outmost <S%H7097><s%> parts of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> you, and from there <S%H8033><s%> will he fetch <S%H3947><s%> you:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed, <S%H3423><s%> and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it; and he will do you good, <S%H3190><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you above your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of your seed, <S%H2233><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%> that you may live. <S%H2416><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H423><s%> on your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> persecuted <S%H7291><s%> you.

And you shall return <S%H7725><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will make you plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land, <S%H127><s%> for good: <S%H2896><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you for good, <S%H2896><s%> as he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> your fathers: <S%H1><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> and if <S%H3588><s%> you turn <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

For this <S%H2063><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> it is not hidden <S%H6381><s%> from you, neither <S%H3808><s%> is it far <S%H7350><s%> off.

It is not in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up for us to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bring <S%H3947><s%> it to us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> it?

Neither <S%H3808><s%> is it beyond <S%H5676><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us, and bring <S%H3947><s%> it to us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> it?
But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to you, in your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> that you may do <S%H6213><s%> it.
See, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good, <S%H2896><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil; <S%H7451><s%>

In that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply: <S%H7235><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

But if <S%H518><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> away, so that you will not hear, <S%H8085><s%> but shall be drawn <S%H5080><s%> away, and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them;

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> to you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely <S%H3588><s%> perish, <S%H6><s%> and that you shall not prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> on the land, <S%H127><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against you, that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H2416><s%> and death, <S%H4194><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> and cursing: <S%H7045><s%> therefore choose <S%H977><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> that both you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> may live: <S%H2421><s%>

That you may love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and that you may obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and that you may hold <S%H1692><s%> to him: for he is your life, <S%H2416><s%> and the length <S%H753><s%> of your days: <S%H3117><s%> that you may dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them.
